name: @scoping/scriptable
description: Write type-safe, concise, continuously-deployed Scriptable apps. Scriptable for iOS and iPadOS lets users author JavaScript procedures invokable by Apple Shortcuts, Share Sheet or Widgets, useful for home and device automation.

scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) & (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) & (if exist .svelte-kit rmdir /s /q .svelte-kit) & (if exist .eslintcache del /f /q .eslintcache)" || rm -rf dist build .svelte-kit .eslintcache
scripts.build: cmd /c "(if exist svelte.config.js (npm run build:svelte) else (npm run build:ts))" || bash -c 'if [ -f svelte.config.js ]; then npm run build:svelte; else npm run build:ts; fi'
scripts.postbuild: npm run lint || echo "Lint failed. Continuing..."
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:clean && npm run deploy:make && npm run deploy:copy && npm run deploy:filter && npm run deploy:replace
scripts.deploy:clean: cmd /c if exist packed rmdir /s /q packed || rm -rf packed
scripts.deploy:filter: cmd /c "(rmdir /s /q packed\_test) & (del /s /q packed\*.tsbuildinfo packed\*.d.ts packed\*.map packed\*.spec.js)" || npm run deploy:filter:default
scripts.deploy:replace: npm run deploy:replace:prepend:header && npm run deploy:replace:prepend:strict && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:import && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export && npm run deploy:replace:delete:source
scripts.deploy:replace:prepend:strict: rr "^((?!\/\/ Variables used by Scriptable\.\s).+)$" "\x22use strict\x22;\n€1" -I -u -G -M -s "packed/**/*.js" -B -H
